description:
The man known as General within a villainous organization that plans to take over the world is usually fighting to the death against the Rangers who protect the Earth...

But today is his day off.

To heal his tired soul from working so hard every day, he goes to the zoo to see pandas and to the convenience store to get some ice cream.

We get to see how a certain villain gets to completely enjoy his days off to the fullest in this comedy that will heal your soul.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: คุณวายร้ายกับวันหยุดสบายๆ ของเขา

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Monster Boy
tags.description: Prominently features a male character who is a part-monster.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Tokusatsu
tags.description: Prominently features elements that resemble special effects in Japanese live-action shows

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Orphan
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is an orphan.

node.description:
**[Website](https://ivudot.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/_763_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/__7_6_3__/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCaCJ5Q1pv7zvcrcN2FQzn6A) | [NicoNico](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/17943410/) | [Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/ivudot_763) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/1IgcHRzXg2POh5QKM1p7mj)**

**Introduction:**
Ivudot is a Japanese male vocalist, singer-songwriter, and utaite. He also formed the unit "Sotto Blue" with [Sou](https://anilist.co/staff/137858/Sou) in 2022.

**Biography:**
In 2012, he started his activities as an artist by uploading his covers.
He took a hiatus from music activities in 2015, removing most of their videos, mylist, and community from the internet.

In March 2018, his cover song "[flos](https://youtu.be/fTH7P6GVHus)" blew up on YouTube, garnering over 28 million views. His overall viewership has now surpassed an astounding 120 million.
That same year, he began creating his own music alongside his singing career, and his debut song "[Yokun](https://youtu.be/eU80nxu-2Jc)" established him as a prominent singer-songwriter.

He released his first album, "NUANCE", in July 2020, but achieved major debut status with his second album, "POP OUT", in December 2022.
He contributed his musical talent to the Japanese television drama "Piece of Cake" by composing its opening theme song in October of the same year.

His musical talent was further recognized in May 2023 when he composed and sang the opening theme song for the TV drama "Ashita, Watashi wa Dareka no Kanojo Season 2", which aired on the "Dramaism" block of MBS/TBS.

**[Website](https://whiteluck-records.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/glasgow_jpn) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/glasgow_jpn/) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@glasgow_jpn) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/3FUuWzheFLPGP7tm5lpjxM)**

**Introduction:**
GLASGOW is a rock band based in Tokyo. They started their activities in September 2018.

**Biography:**
In 2018, two self-produced CDs recorded cumulative sales of over 1,000 copies at Tower Records Shibuya and an indies mail order site. They also ranked first in the weekly ranking of CDs that are not distributed in the same store.

In December 2019, they launched their own label, "whiteluck records."

In 2021, they won the TOKYO FM-sponsored "FESTIVAL OUT" audition project. As the grand prix artist, they performed as the opening act for "LIVE BLAST powered by Fanpla Kit."

They gave a stunning performance in front of an audience of about 1,200 people at Toyosu PIT.

In March 2023, they released their first nationwide distributed EP, "FOOLISH AS THEY MAY SEEM."

**Members:**
- Aratani – Vocalist, Guitarist
- Eita Fujimoto – Guitarist
Distinguished Japanese animator and director known for his extensive contributions to anime
